inventory=[{"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 34, "index": 10}, {"type": "spruce_pressure_plate", "quantity": 33, "index": 12}, {"type": "white_terracotta", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "chain", "quantity": 18, "index": 16}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 42, "index": 19}, {"type": "black_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "stone_pressure_plate", "quantity": 33, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 24}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 50, "index": 32}, {"type": "gold_nugget", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 55, "index": 34}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 36, "index": 35}, {"type": "cooked_beef", "quantity": 61, "index": 36}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_block", "quantity": 16, "index": 37}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 23, "index": 38}, {"type": "oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}, {"type": "lime_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 25, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a birch_boat, I need to place 5 birch_planks in a U shape in the crafting grid. I will start by moving 1 birch_planks from slot 24 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1
